COL DISTEARATE, POLYQUATERNIUM-10, PHENOXYETHANOL, CITRIC ACID, COCAMIDE MEA, DISODIUM EDTA, DMDM HYDANTOIN, ALOE BARBADENSIS LEAF EXTRACT.
